title: Yaowarat (Eng Hardsub) [Thai Movie]
description:
Title: Yaowarat
Detail: Action / Drama
Country: Thailand
Language : Thai 
Subtitle : English Hardsub
Year: 2003
Lead Actors:
Shahkrit Yamnarm... Sa-Leng
Darawan Wilaingam... Tan-Yong
Supporting Actors:
Suwannaparp... Kao-Lad
Suthida Harnwisej... Mai-Hom
Sattawat Dullayawijitt... Tong, The Mafia
Aadchara Luengsawat... The Mafia&#039;s Wife
IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0783860/ <a href="
http://www.ethaicd.com/show.php?pid=11869" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ethaicd.com/show.php?pid=11869</a>

Story : 

The small but extremely profitable plot of land in Bangkok called Yaowarat has so far been protected peacefully by mafia godfather Tong, with the faithful assistance of Saleng as his right-hand man. Meanwhile, the Pahurat area is controlled by another prominent gangster, Dada, and his close partner, Kaolad. The peaceful coexistence of the rival territories is shattered when these two underworld lynchpins challenge each other for power. The struggle is destined to be a bloody one and men will lose their lives before it is resolved.
